organizations: Lauren Brant Robbie Patterson The Daily Telegraph Beau Ryan
title: Beau apologises over ‘affair’ scandal
text:
Beau Ryan apologises over scandal about his alleged affair with former Hi-5 star ­Lauren Brant Robbie Patterson The Daily Telegraph Beau Ryan apologises over scandal about his alleged affair with former Hi-5 star ­Lauren Brant Robbie Patterson The Daily Telegraph Beau Ryan, third from left, on The Footy Show Grand Final Spectacular / Picture: Jonathan Ng 
AN emotional Beau Ryan used his ­appearance on The Footy Show to publicly apologise for the controversy that erupted over allegations he had an affair with ex-Hi-5 star ­Lauren Brant. 
Ryan, 30, opened the show by saying he wanted to “apologise to all of the people who have been hurt recently”. 
A supportive live studio audience emphatically cheered him and shouted encouragement. Lauren Brant’s fiance went public with the affair. Beau Ryan with wife Kara and their daughter. The incident came to light after Brant’s former partner Warren Riley claimed the duo had cheated on their respective partners back in July / Picture: Jonathan Ng Contrite ... Beau Ryan on The Footy Show Grand Final Spectacular / Picture: Jonathan Ng Erin Molan: 'Beau will be on the show!' 2:23 
Erin Molan confirms Beau Ryan will be back on The Footy Show, as she catches up with Sydney Confidential Live on the Dally M awards red carpet. September 28th 2015 /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ Erin Molan: 'Beau will be on the show!' Erin Molan confirms Beau Ryan will be back on The Footy Show, as she catches up with Sydney Confidential Live on the Dally M awards red carpet. 1 of n 
Ryan did not mention his wife of three years Kara Orrell, nor did he mention Brant. “It has been really hard for me and my ­family,” he said. 
“It has been really hard for myself and my family,” he said. 
“I want to thank everyone for their support ... thank you to everyone who has been respectful of my privacy, I would love for people to continue to do that.” Other Stories
